frontmatter.title: Installation of AWS Distro for OpenTelemetry using EKS Add-Ons
frontmatter.description: This page is about leveraging Amazon EKS add-ons to install ADOT.

headings.value: Leverage EKS Add-Ons to deploy the ADOT Operator to your Amazon EKS cluster
Deploy the ADOT Operator to your Amazon EKS cluster through the EKS console
Use your IAM role to launch the ADOT Collector
